right-mediainfo-term:
{{doc-right|mediainfo-term}}
Right to alter the [[d:Special:MyLanguage/Wikidata:Glossary#Term|terms]] of [[d:Wikidata:Glossary#media info|media info]] entities.
slot-name-mediainfo: Label for the part of the page on which structured media info is stored.
wikibase-entity-mediainfo: How we refer to entities of type media info. See also the Wikidata glossary on [[d:Wikidata:Glossary#mediainfo|media info]].
wikibase-mediainfo-summary-wbsetlabel-ad: {{wikibase summary messages|mediainfo|Automatic edit summary generated when creating a file's caption, which appears in the ''captions'' block underneath the thumbnail on the image page. Example of a full edit summary is "Added [en] caption: A cat relaxes in the sunshine.".}}
wikibase-mediainfo-summary-wbsetlabel-re: {{wikibase summary messages|mediainfo|Automatic edit summary generated when removing a file's caption, which appears in the ''captions'' block underneath the thumbnail on the image page. Example edit summary is "Removed [en] label".}}
wikibase-mediainfo-summary-wbsetlabel-se: {{wikibase summary messages|mediainfo|Automatic edit summary generated when editing an file's caption, which appears in the ''captions'' block underneath the thumbnail on the image page. Example of a full edit summary is "Updated [en] caption: A domestic cat relaxes in the sunshine.".}}
wikibasemediainfo-diffview-label: Sub heading for caption changes in a diff.
wikibasemediainfo-entitytermsforlanguage:
List of labels, aliases and descriptions in one or more languages: Heading of the "caption" column.
{{Identical|Caption}}
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-fileinfo-head: Label for the 'File information' tab on the File page
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-structured-da: Label for the 'Structured data' tab on the File page
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-captions-titl: Title for the section displaying multi-lingual file captions
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-more-language:
Text for link for expanding structured data to see more languages. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of languages, for PLURAL support
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-fewer-languag: Text for link for collapsing structured data to see fewer languages
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-add-caption: Text for link for adding a caption
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-edit-captions: Label text for edit captions icon
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-edit-depicts: Label text for edit depicts icon
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-cancel:
Label for 'cancel' button for editing structured data on file page
{{Identical|Cancel}}
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-cancel-confir: Alert message to confirm user will cancel and discard changes
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-edit: Label for 'edit' button for editing structured data on file page
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-publish: Label for 'publish' button for editing structured data on file page
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-caption-empty: Text to display when a caption is missing for a language, as a call-to-action for the user to add a caption
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-caption-too-l:
Error text for when a caption is too long. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of characters over maximum, for PLURAL support
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-caption-appro:
Warning text when a caption is approaching the length limit. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of characters left before reaching max character count, for PLURAL support
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-no-: Text to display when a statement has an explicit 'NO VALUE' value.
Text to display when we want to display statements for a particular property (e.g. depicts) but there is no data for it
Text to display when no results for a query have been found, e.g. in autocomplete widgets
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-som: Text to display when a statement has an explicit 'SOME VALUE' value.
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-err: Text to display when a statement has a wrong kind of value; should never occur.
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-license-title: Title for dialog with licensing instructions
wikibasemediainfo-statements-depicts-tit: Title text for section for adding items depicted in the image
wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-add-qu: Text for button to add a qualifier
wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-input-: Label text for input fields autocompleting Wikidata properties
Placeholder text for input field to search for properties
wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-is-pro:
Text for link when statement is prominent, to turn it normal again.

In the context of "depicts" statements, "prominent" describes a thing or a person that is displayed prominently in an image.
wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-mark-a: Text for link to make statement prominent. "Prominent" must be translated with the same word as in {{msg-mw|Wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-is-prominent}}.
wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-remove: Title text for button to remove a property
wikibasemediainfo-statements-learn-more: Text for link to page to learn more about statements
wikibasemediainfo-statements-remove: Text for button to remove statements
wikibasemediainfo-statements-title-depic: Title for the group of statements for 'Depicts'
wikibasemediainfo-filetype-3d: Label for filetypes dropdown for '3D models'
wikibasemediainfo-filetype-office:
Label for filetypes dropdown for 'Office'. It describes document files that are created by various office suites: Microsoft Word, LibreOffice, PDF, etc.
{{Identical|Office}}
wikibasemediainfo-search-input-placehold: Placeholder text for the input to search by keyword
Placeholder text for the input to search by depicted items
Placeholder text for the input to search by other statements
wikibasemediainfo-search-qualifiers-add: Label for button to add a qualifier in the depicts search popover
wikibasemediainfo-search-qualifiers-canc:
Label for button to cancel the depicts search popover
{{Identical|Cancel}}
wikibasemediainfo-search-qualifiers-save:
Label for button to save the depicts search popover
{{Identical|Save}}
wikibasemediainfo-search-qualifiers-titl: Title for the depicts search popover. It means "statements with the 'depicts' property" ([[:d:Property:P180|P180]] in Wikidata).
wikibasemediainfo-search-qualifiers-intr: Intro text for the depicts search popover
wikibasemediainfo-search-statements-add: Label for button to add a statement in the statements search popover
wikibasemediainfo-search-statements-canc:
Label for button to cancel the statements search popover
{{Identical|Cancel}}
wikibasemediainfo-search-statements-save:
Label for button to save the statements search popover
{{Identical|Search}}
wikibasemediainfo-search-statements-titl: Title for the statements search popover
wikibasemediainfo-search-statements-intr: Intro text for the statements search popover
wikibasemediainfo-search-toggle-keywords: Text for button to toggle to 'keyword' search mode
wikibasemediainfo-search-toggle-depicts: Text for button to toggle to 'depicts' search mode
wikibasemediainfo-search-toggle-statemen: Text for button to toggle to 'other statements' search mode
